entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Arm: Revisit ClassLayout::GetRegisterType() #59290
  • NotSupportedException at at System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC.HashFinal() #59289
  • [API Proposal]: add a setter to TransactionManager.MaximumTimeout #59282
  • [wasm] Publish deletes *build* intermediate files, causing relinking on incremental build #59278
    7.0.0
  • Consider adding ArgumentEmptyException #59273
  • .NET 6.0 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #59272
  • Post-6.0 infrastructure improvements #59271
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: add overloads to support IAsyncEnumerable with source-gen #59268
    7.0.0
  • FilteredByLevel_InsideScope benchmark has regressed #59267
  • MutualThdRecur-fptr.sh failed with NullReferenceException on Ubuntu #59260
  • Wasm native dependencies: [DllImport] in own source code doesn't work #59255
    6.0.0
  • Convering `DateOnly/TimeOnly` from string #59253
  • Missing tag/release for 5.0.10 #59250
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, runtime, .NET 6 RC 2, validation-runtime-.NET 6 RC 2 #runtime-109158-.NET6RC2 #59241
  • System.TypeLoadException : Type 'System.Configuration.ClientSettingsSection' does not inherit from 'System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler' #59239

Closed

  • Attempting to JIT compile method in System.Text.Json tests on iOS devices #58204
    7.0.0
  • Enum.ToUInt64() performance improvement #59248
  • Potential perf regression in Utf8Encoding.GetBytes #59146
  • .NET 5.0 - ShortDatePattern for the culture nl-NL has changed #59251
  • WebSocket UTF8 output validation doesn't throw #59214
    7.0.0
  • Is the breaking change in PipeWriterStream.WriteAsync intentional? #59209
  • System.Drawing.Common is no longer usable from < netcoreapp3.1 projects #59032
    6.0.0
  • Running a .NET 5 project on macOS M1 with .NET 6 leads to confusing error message #59168
  • INT64 size array support in c# #59245
  • Parallel.ForEachAsync hits assert when loop body throws OperationCanceledException #58981
    6.0.0
  • The behavior of the BufferBlock<T>.Fault method appears to be inconsistent #59197

PullRequests

Created

  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Loader/Binder area #59288
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • JIT: update debug dumping for loop hoisting #59287
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1369634 #59286
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Check if External Object Context is still active after a possible GC #59285
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Enable regions by default #59283
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Work around for forbidden "Roslyn4.0" in test name on Android #59281
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/6.0-rc2][wasm] Bump sdk version for workload testing to 6.0.100-rc.2.21467.10 #59279
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Update xunit version on release branch #59277
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Prevent racing on installer shared props/targets #59276
  • Update xunit version on dotnet/runtime #59275
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove some unnecessary allocations / copies on startup #59270
    area-Host
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [MonoVM] Reduce P/Invoke GC transition asserts in release builds #59269
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Cleanup defines in System.Linq.Expressions #59266
    area-System.Linq.Expressions, community-contribution
  • Cleanup defines in DirectoryServices.AccountManager #59265
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [interp] Add wide data item index static load and stores #59262
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [interp] Disable optimization if the var index is greater than G_MAXUINT16 #59261
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Create and publish missing symbols #59259
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [iOS] Make sure IPGlobalProperties and NetworkInterface.GetIsNetworkAvailable methods return the correct info #59258
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net
  • Fix invalid parsing of not unicode Uri #59252
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • EmccCompile: reduce allowedParallelism by 1, to account for the implicit core #59244
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Update source-gen APIs according to review #59243
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #59238
    area-codeflow

Merged

  • Expose nint/nuint overloads for BitOperations #58733
    area-System.Numerics
  • Get rid of ModuleDesc.GetTypeResolutionFailure #59249
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove some of the restrictions on constrained calls from #59182
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Implement UriCreationOptions #59274
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix Logging Source Generator to handle file-scoped namespaces (#57894) #59100
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Allow folding of `LONG` nodes with field sequences #57605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Work around for forbidden "Roslyn4.0" in test name on Android #59263
    os-android, area-Build-mono
  • Only set path in x64 mac installer when installing on x64 #59210
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Refactor symmetric one-shots for improved performance #58270
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [interp] Add wide data item index static load and stores #59220
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove mostly unused SafeFileHandleHelper.Unix class #59254
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • update crossfs for FreeBSD 12.2 #59240
    os-freebsd, area-Infrastructure
  • [interp] Disable optimization if the var index is greater than G_MAXUINT16 #59225
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Fix corner-case handling of cancellation exception in ForEachAsync #59237
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [release/6.0] Single-file apps should not use copy-on-write mapping of the .exe on windows. #59194
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, 6.0.0
  • [docs] Add instructions for debugging native runtime code on Android #59183
    documentation, area-Build-mono
  • Bump RC2 intellisense version #59223
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor XmlWriter{Async} #58105
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • File.Unix: save a syscall on the File.{Write*,Append*} methods. #59247
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix ro segments with regions #58811
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix corner-case handling of cancellation exception in ForEachAsync #59065
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 6.0.0
  • Update source-gen APIs according to review #59042
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Require UTF8 encoding in GetX509NameInfo #59172
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • FreeBSD fix for AF_UNIX IPC socket permission #58688
    os-freebsd, community-contribution

Updated

  • Add initial regex source generator #59186
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Undo breaking change compat in GetMethodNativeMap #59231
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Align preallocationSize behavior #59078
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Arm: Use correct form of store instruction when data is float #59187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Setup retry for System.Net.* tests #57370
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • Refactor subrange assertion generation and propagation #55186
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, Future
  • JIT: Return multiple likely classes in getLikelyClass (for better GDV) #58984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use correct NumberStyle when parsing double and float #59205
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [MONO][WASM] Changed wasmapp.LocalBuild.props to use net6.0 #59213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • [wasm] WebSocket improve send/receive buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • [HTTP/3] Fix NullReferenceException on Timeout when streaming request body #59204
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
  • Experiment with compressing individual method contexts #59000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update ServiceProviderServiceExtensions.cs #58685
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/6.0-rc2] MonoAOTCompiler: detect when nothing has changed, and skip any precompiling #58979
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Switch Windows Checked build to `-O2` from `-O1` #59235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • LoggerMessage formatter performance improvements #58524
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Enable runtime tests to run on Android arm32 #51642
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • First round of converting System.Data.OleDb to COMWrappers #54822
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Rocky Linux support #59178
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Optimize Vector128/256.Equals via TestZ #55875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Run disabled tests on windows #52672
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Process.Unix: handle ETXTBSY error when executing file that was just written by .NET. #59079
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Add superpmi.exe option to break to the debugger on exception. #59234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Swap using the provided indexes #55331
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • RID work for macOS 12 #59066
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement full GC suspension #1567
  • GenericStructConstraintPropertiesTest fails in NativeAOT #1563

Closed

  • `EventWaitHandle` based while loop in bg thread hang on GC in macOS [NativeAOT] #1560
  • Get CsWinRT going #1453
  • Support module constructors #193

PullRequests

Created

  • Make GetFixedPrefix in SymbolicRegexNode iterative #1569
  • Delete NativeFormat-based type system #1568
    area-NativeAOT
  • Remove custom serialization mechanism from symbolic regex #1558

Merged

  • Fix GC polls around Thread.Spinwait #1565
  • Fix building System.IO.Compression.Native #1561
    area-NativeAOT
  • Delete unnecessary binplace of libraries .lib files #1564
  • Fix bunch of CS8600 #1566
  • Merge from dotnet/runtime #1562
  • password search unit test with conjunction and complement #1556
  • Make compiler a bit more resilient #1559
    area-NativeAOT
  • Add support for module initializers #1557

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet publish self-contained fail to find runtime identifier in command line when using web sdk #21116
  • Set TransactionScope MaximumTimeout when API is ready #21101
    6.0.2xx
  • Exception in dotnet build using ModuleInitializerAttribute and BenchmarkDotNet. #21094
  • TimestampedFileLogger is eating a lot of CPU #21083
  • Environment.OSVersion returns "Windows NT 10.0.22458.0" on my Windows 11 22458.1000 #21075
  • PublishReadyToRun uses outdated references from previous builds #21072

Closed

  • After Install 6.0 RC1 on Mac OS, install wasm-tools workload via Terminal met an error "Workload installation failed". #20833
    6.0.1xx
  • NuGet.targets incorrectly performs a url-decode on filesystem paths, resulting in projects not found #20901
  • Assembly.Location returns empty string on Publish #20939
  • Support URL's in workload update's --from-rollback-file parameter #20879
    6.0.1xx
  • Workload commands failing after installing VS2022 Preview 3 and .NET 6 Preview 7 #19671
  • Implicit using issue with multiple level `Directory.Build.props` #21073
  • dotnet workload update behaves badly #21031
    6.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1369485 #21114
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc2] BlazorWasm: Fix including the target assembly #21104
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Create UpdateToNewTargetFramework.md #21103
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix 10 minutes time out of TransactionScope #21102
    Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1368921 #21100
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use a BlockingCollection in the logger to reduce CPU usage #21085
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21084
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Warn when Targeting net6.0 with 16.11 and the 6.0 SDK #20987
    Servicing-consider, Area-NetSDK
  • Tweak the hot reload update toast #21058
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Adding retries to nuget package downloader #20727
    Area-Workloads
  • Allow specifying url for workload rollback #20991
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix nuget config not being honored #20930
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update build.yml #21057
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21049
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix null ref in update command #21063
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix EnableTrimAnalyzer for TFMs < 6.0 #20937
    Area-ILLink

Updated

  • Update BlazorWebAssembly targets to work with updated wasm targets #21022
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update ValidateExecutableReferences with new schema #19786
    Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Open issue: list-pattern questions for 9/20/2021 #5201

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Create `fullnameof(element)` expression #5199

PullRequests

Updated

  • Create proposal spec file for null-conditional and null-coalescing operators on pointers #5198

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Json source generator corrupts Workspace #56499
  • Unexpected formatting warning for a space between a `new` modifier and a tuple type syntax. #56498
  • "using" command in "Quick Actions and Refactoring" missing (CSharpAddImportCodeFixProvider is disabled) #56497
  • Change Signature crashes if the signature is not valid #56495
  • Analyzer to detect boolean expressions and replace them with patterns. #56494
  • Can't read lightbulb entries when they are too long #56485
  • Visual Studio does not suggest import of "System.Windows.Forms" for usage of "DialogResult" enum #56483
  • "Insert space between method name and its opening parenthesis" apper twice in the new editorConfig UI #56482
  • MicroBenchmark for InheritanceMarginGlyph #56481

Closed

  • MakeLocalFunctionStaticCodeRefactoringProvider crashes casting LocalFunctionSymbol to SynthesizedSimpleProgramEntryPointSymbol #53179
    17.0
  • Can't disable Code Style Suggestions #56461
  • netstandard2.1 - source generators is not working #56479
  • Constant, frequent crash VS 16.11 with Source Generator use #55658
    17.0
  • Compilation fails when using module initializers and DebugType:pdbonly #56412
    17.0
  • Review potential code paths that may or may not need to handle record structs #53631
    17.0
  • Flow graph displays wrong IExpressionStatementOperation syntax in test case #56478
  • Crash when trying to turn a variable into a parameter #47586
    Backlog
  • Assertion failed in AbstractMergeNestedIfStatementsCodeRefactoringProvider.IsFirstStatementOfIfOrElseIf #55563
    Backlog
  • Improve design of partner component hosting in Roslyn ServiceHub process #44326
    17.0.P4

PullRequests

Created

  • Make method extensions #56491
    Area-IDE
  • Add more tests around case sensitivity and project reference conversion #56490
    Area-IDE
  • Make 'Languages' not part of hte state of an optionset #56489
    Area-IDE
  • Make abstract type actually implement interface. #56488
    Area-IDE
  • Make path comparison case insensitive #56477
    Area-IDE
  • Navigate to PDB Source documents #56476
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56472
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Optimize InheritanceMarginGlyph construction #56471
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix MakeLocalFunctionStatic for top-level local function #56473
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Handle interaction of VB with Static Abstract Members in interfaces #56375
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56493
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56492
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix features using ISyntaxFacts as a place to store C# specific questions #56484
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56486
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Implement INamespaceTypeReference.GetUnit for RootModuleType #56450
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56487
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56469
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix UseAutoProperty for record structs #56474
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Migrate to consistent pattern for ISyntaxFacts #56458
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't offer to generate parameters in lambdas #56397
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56475
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix merge if in top level statements #56373
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56456
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update UnitTesting Hot Reload API to consider syntax errors #56379
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56470
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56468
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove JSON serialization helpers #56465
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56500
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • When we're loading dependencies in VS, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix DefaultAnalyzerAssemblyLoader #56357
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix partial method doc comments #56419
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC/HR interface unification #56424
    Area-Interactive
  • Allow user-defined conversions from lambda expressions or method groups to Delegate, Expression, and base types #56416
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for all parenthesized binary additions of interpolated strings #56333
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Avoid several breaking changes in overload resolution from inferred types of lambda expressions and method groups #56341
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • List patterns: add more tests and fix nullability analysis #53822
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Add completion tests for parameters in top-level statements #56385
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Components that mirror HTML elements can result in bad colorization #36691
    Razor.Tooling
  • Locating an owner in a Razor syntax tree can fail #36689
  • Unable to deploy web app using MSBuild #36686
  • Update the compiler version referenced by Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor #36682
    6.0.0
  • efcore dependency out of date #36680
  • Minimal API experience in VS Code Dev Container / Codespaces #36678
  • Need to doc react/spa first request auth issue for 6.0 #36676
    6.0.0
  • Embedded JavaScript doesn't get TextMate colorization in dark theme #36673
    17.0-Preview5
  • RC1 Failed connection handshake after update from Preview 7 -> RC1 #36672
  • Startup improvement: single_query #36671
  • Startup regression: mvc #36670
  • [HTTP/3] Reading the request headers timed out. #36669
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Use SslApplicationProtocol.Http3 constant #36668
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Scrub File prefix from internal File*Result types #36666
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Support extension methods for custom TryParse/BindAsync declared on a static class with a known name #36664
  • RequestDelegateFactory (minimal APIs) should support discovering TryParse & BindAsync methods from inherited types #36663
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Signalr can't connect on latest RC1 Angular template #36661
  • Using HotReload with bind-Value causes an exception #36659
  • Revert Enforce WebSockets Transport for Blazor #36655
    6.0-rc2
  • Razor DocumentSynchronizer needs a "strict" mode #36654
    17.0-Preview5
  • WPF signalr client fails to connect to hub via web socket after updating to .NET 6 RC #36652
  • Call API to get Configuration values at Startup.cs #36650
  • Support binding parameters to type Uri in Minimal Actions #36649
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Hot Reload: Net 6.0 RC1 - System.ArgumentException: 'The renderer does not have a component with ID 14.' #36648
  • Issue with running docker-compose on .NET 6 RC1 #36646
  • Make AuthorizationMiddlewareResultHandler.HandleAsync virtual #36645
    Backlog
  • Startup regression: caching #36644
  • HiddenFor generates Required for Nullable values #36643
  • .NET 6 rc and Blazor Web Assembly Publish fails from Visual Studio #36641
  • .NET6 rc - MSB3030: Azure Pipeline Publish fails for Blazor Server Project that references nested razor component libraries #36639
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 6, aspnetcore #aspnetcore-109146-.NET6 #36638
  • Analyzers for Minimal APIs #36637
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Generating REST Clients for .NET Minimal / Web API APIs. #36636
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Renaming components or property types can result in stale intellisense #34781
    17.0-Preview5
  • Template: WeatherForecast for WebAPI template should be lower case #36658
  • Throw for invalid TryParse and BindAsync methods #36523
    6.0-rc2
  • VS Code: Type "@DateTime" in the _layout.cshtml , the color of this symbol is incorrect. #36495
  • PathString.FromUriComponent(string) should not decode %2F to forward slash #2686
    Backlog
  • Render Fragments Under Visual Studio 2022 Not Showing Up Under Intellisense #36120
    17.0-Preview5
  • Allow SignalR to work in AWS serverless environment #36575
  • Bootstrap sxs cleanup #36288
    6.0.0
  • Missing .msg extension in FileExtensionContentTypeProvider #36576
  • API proposal: ObjectPool IServiceCollection helper extension #36586
  • Minimal APIs should return the standard media type for Problem Details responses #36557
    6.0-rc2
  • ApiExplorer is useless #36140
    Discussions
  • Update ASP.NET Core F# project templates to use new minimal hosting APIs in .NET 6 #34123
    6.0.0
  • HostingEventSource uses EtwSelfDescribingFormat instead EtwManifestFormat #30584
    Next sprint planning
  • Route handlers throw System.Text.Json.JsonReader exception for requests with invalid JSON body rather than returning 422 #36499
    6.0-rc2
  • RC1: Unable to connect, please ensure WebSockets are available. A VPN or proxy may be blocking the connection. #36596
    6.0-rc2
  • Return ok from controller before async Task complete #36600
  • Startup regression: fortunes_ef #36436
  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper #36566
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #36609
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #36610
  • TestServer can not resolve route for URI with HTTP encoded parameters #36598
  • .NET 6 rc with Blazor Server deployed on Azure Web Service fails with an Internal Error #36642
  • Analyzers for Minimal APIs #35528
    6.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Pin analyzers that ship in the SDK #36690
  • Find inherited TryParse and BindAsync #36688
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update BlazorServerApp Sample Project #36684
    area-blazor
  • open DI in F# webapi project template #36683
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix and test HttpSys delegation #36677
    area-runtime
  • Add more details about helix payload #36665
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Use minimal APIs for F# project templates #36660
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #36657
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Revert Enforce WebSockets Transport for Blazor #36656
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Update code docs for DynamicRouteValueTransformer #36653
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add test for BoundAttributDescriptor HashCode #36679
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/5.0] Use ArrayPool as default pool fallback #36559
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime
  • Improve documentation #36496
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
